entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Hot Reload agent should not be loading all types from an updated assembly #34695
  • The FrameworkReference 'NETStandard.Library' was not recognized - Xamarin.Forms vs4mac #34662

Closed

  • Improve the first-run experience for workloads - detect common version mismatch scenarios and tell the user the actions to perform to resolve them #31872

PullRequests

Created

  • Backport of 'First-run workload experience #34322' to release/8.0.1xx #34694
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement automated cleanup of stage 0 #34693
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2245468 #34688
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add back the current version of MSBuild that got removed by accident in the CPM PR #34687
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix in Microsoft.NET.Sdk.DefaultItems.targets for .DS_Store causing build failures on MacOSX #34666
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Allow ArtifactsPath telemetry to flow #34660
    untriaged, Document for new feature, Area-NetSDK
  • Ran 'dotnet format' on sdk.sln #34659
    untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Fix runtime pack selection for `dotnet build` with PublishAot=true and PublishAotUsingRuntimePack=true #34658
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc1] Fix runtime pack selection for `dotnet build` with PublishAot=true and PublishAotUsingRuntimePack=true #34657
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK

Merged

  • Fix redist.csproj build failure on SLN rebuild in VS #34587
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • First-run workload experience #34322
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Enable the backport flow similar to other repos #34654
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Backport terminal logger enablement #34682
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove a nowarn line added for preview 1 #34345
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] One option for fixing the locked file issue in the test #34684
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Add WorkloadPublishProperties telemetry event #34681
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • reenable CI for the 1xx branch #34656
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc1] Add WorkloadPublishProperties telemetry event #34680
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [Containers] Implement OAuth token login for container registries #34678
    Area-Containers
  • MSBuild terminal logger enamblement. #34606
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Containers: implementation of OAuth2 #34237
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Fix runtime pack selection for `dotnet build` with PublishAot=true and PublishAotUsingRuntimePack=true #34640
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #34652
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add AdditionalRuntimeIdentifier if building from source #34650
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update onelocbuild to 8.0.1xx #34642
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable transitive pinning #34387
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update our TFM support and error messaging for 17.7 #34585
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add design proposal for workload history #30486
  • Download tool packages from NuGet feeds directly, instead of implicitly restoring #33835
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Crossplatform ResourceUpdater #34394
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [wasm] Remove `UsingMicrosoftNETSdkBlazorWebAssembly` from Wasm SDK #34166
    untriaged, Area-WasmSdk
  • Copying the test project to the temporary folder is to change the hard coding of the tfm and package version #34624
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • When transforming web.config check if target framework is .NET Framework. #34618
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Add better error messages when we can't fetch manifests #34460
    untriaged, Area-Containers, 8.0.1xx
  • Add workload version subcommand Fixes #33912 #33996
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
